Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Seal impression
Description: Fragment of a seal impression from a granary in the name of Senwosret II. These official seals, rectangular with a rounded base, could have been in the shape of statuette. This one was affixed on to a bolt, probably that of the principal royal granary of the fortress of Mirgissa/Iken.
